Title: JSkin C# WinForms Skin Library
Description: jSkin is .NET Winforms Skin Library that allows you to decorate your Formborder with custom style.
HomeWiki:
jSkin - Custom Window Skin Library for .NET Winforms

jSkin is .NET Winforms Skin Library that allows you to decorate your Formborder with custom style.
This library is compatible to .NET Framework 3.5/4.0 in C# and VB.NET language.


Features

  • Apply skin by simply adding the control to the form
  • Alter the Form Text or ICON by changing the property of the Form
